Default.order_confirm_header: Thank you for shopping with us!
Default.order_confirm_message: Your order has been received and we are currently processing it. You can view the order on the my orders page or print your order. If you need to edit your order please contact us. Thanks again and let us know if there’s anything we can do to make your shopping experience better.
